topic.title: Oxygen AI Positron Vertex AI Connector Add-on for Web Author

body.p: The Oxygen AI Positron Vertex AI Connector add-on provides a connector for the Oxygen AI Positron Assistant in Web Author. The connector, named Vertex AI Service, enables integration with Google Cloud's Vertex AI platform. The Oxygen AI Positron Vertex AI Connector add-on is compatible with Oxygen XML Web Author version 27.1.0 or newer.

section.title: Installation
section.p: You can download the plugin from here: Oxygen AI Positron Vertex AI Connector Add-on Download.
You can then install the plugin in the Web Author or Content Fusion server to make the Vertex AI Service connector available in the Oxygen AI Positron Assistant Enterprise for Web Author plugin.

section.title: How to configure the Vertex AI Service connector
section.p:
When the Vertex AI Service is selected from the AI Service administration page, the following options are available to configure the connector:
Project ID The ID of your Google Cloud project.
Location The location of your Google Cloud project (e.g., us-central1).
Model The AI model to use (e.g., google/gemini-2.0-flash).
Credential The content of the Google credential JSON file. The connector supports several credential configuration files for:
Workforce Identity Federation: Use an external identity provider (IdP) to authenticate and authorize users to access Google Cloud resources.
Workload Identity Federation: Use an external IdP to authenticate and authorize workloads to access Google Cloud resources.
Service Account Key: Use a service account key file for authentication.

GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS environment variable
The attached service account
